text: Hello everybody! Is it possible to use React to create public apps? Do you have some documentation. I understood that UI Extensions with React is only for private apps yet.

Hi Harlley! Yes, you are correct - UI Extensions with React is only available for private apps right now :slightly_smiling_face:

I'm curious though, do you work with any marketplace app partner?
Seth when using fetchProperties is there a way to fetch associated object properties through the current object record?
Or more specifically. I have on deal creation required they add a contact and company.
Not with that `action`. You'll have to use a serverless function to fetch them.
And the serverless is just making an API call right?
yep! You can use the HubSpot node client to make things easier as well
